biotools.summary:
a bioinformatics tool for prediction of S-sulphenylation in the human proteome based on multi-stage ensemble-learning models.

SIMLIN: an improved bioinformatics approach based on multi-stage ensemble learning model for S-sulphenylation prediction

bioschemas.name: SIMLIN
